summary: An old Orcish stronghold that is now dedicated to the dragonborn and protected by the members of the Ushama clan that protect them.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b]Ushama strongold[/b][/size]

[size=3]A simple orcish stronghold and player home.[/size]
[size=2]Requires no DLC![/size]

[b]Backstory:[/b]
[size=3]Chief Ushama, chieftain of the Ushama clan, has given up his stronghold and moved on.[/size]
[size=3]He has entrusted the stronghold to you, the dragonborn, and let some of his people stay[/size]
[size=3]behind to protect you and your home![/size]

[size=3]Â [/size][b]Features:
- [/b][size=3]Watchtower and perimeter walls[/size]
[size=3]- Ushama guards[/size]
[size=3]- Blacksmithing station outside of the longhouse[/size]
[size=3]- Alchemy station inside[/size]
[size=3]- Bedroom[/size]
[size=3]- A few weapons, armour and ingots inside the home[/size]
[size=3]- Partially decorated interior[/size]

[b]Location:
[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/HvQS3fw.jpg[/img]

[/center]
author: Acka01
